TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CGTextDrawingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Text drawing mode used by Quartz.
Docs.remarks: These drawing modes are used with the method and they specify how the glyphs that make up the text should be drawn.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode Clip = unsigned int32(7)

Docs.summary: Performs a clip operation using the current clip path without drawing the text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode Fill = unsigned int32(0)

Docs.summary: Perform a Fill operation on the text glyphs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode FillClip = unsigned int32(4)

Docs.summary: Perform a Fill operation on the text glyphs followed by a clip operation using the current clip path.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode FillStroke = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: Perform a Fill operation followed by a Stroke operation on the text glyphs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode FillStrokeClip = unsigned int32(6)

Docs.summary: Perform a Stroke operation on the text glyphs followed by a clip operation using the current clip path.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode Invisible = unsigned int32(3)

Docs.summary: Does not draw the text, merely updates the text position

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode Stroke = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: Perform a Stroke operation on the text glyphs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreGraphics.CGTextDrawingMode StrokeClip = unsigned int32(5)
